wikitext.*:
'''''kibil''''' is a [[Khuzdul]] word for [[silver]].<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], [[Nancy Smith]], "[[Index questions]]" (quoted in {{HM|RC}}, p. 269)</ref>

It is possible that it is related to [[Sindarin]] ''[[celeb]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Helge Fauskanger]]|website=Arda|articleurl=http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/khuzdul.htm|articlename=Khuzdul - the secret tongue of the Dwarves}}</ref>

*[[Kibil-nâla]]
